newAttributes

public static org.xml.sax.Attributes newAttributes(java.lang.String... args)
Creates a new instance of Attributes from the given parameter strings. The attributes need to be given in pairs, e.g. "id", "1234" - This will create "id=1234".

Parameters:
args - attribute name-value pairs
Returns:
a new instance of Attributes
